description:
Are the mountains calling your name? Do you dream of white peaks and powder days? Then this long sleeve graphic tee gets you.

But what's a great graphic without a great fabric? That's what they said, which is why this men's tee is made from a lightweight and breathable organic cotton and recycled poly fabric— great for you, and great for the planet (and those mountains you love too).
name: Prana Mountain Maven LS - Mens
